title: Why South Korea is paying its citizens to date, marry, and have children

Candidates are advised to use correct login details, follow official instructions, and contact NTA support if needed.

description: VV Rajesh made history as the first BJP Mayor of Thiruvananthapuram Corporation, winning with 51 votes. He garnered support from 50 BJP councillors and one independent. The UDF candidate received 17 votes, and the LDF candidate secured 29 votes in the election.

title: Ranveer starrer nears Rs. 635 Cr as Kartik's rom-com slumps
description: Aditya Dhar’s 'Dhurandhar' continues its historic box office dominance, crossing Rs. 634.3 crore by Day 22. Despite the Christmas holiday, Kartik Aaryan’s 'Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri' struggled significantly, earning only Rs. 7.39 crore in two days due to limited screen allocation and the overwhelming popularity of the Ranveer Singh-starrer.

Khan, now a UK citizen, allegedly drew a government salary from 2013-2017 while living abroad and acquired properties worth over Rs 30 crore.

description: A shocking incident unfolded in Hyderabad as a 26-year-old woman was allegedly burnt alive by her husband. The victim, Chityala Triveni, succumbed to her injuries after being doused with petrol and set ablaze by her husband, K Venkatesh, who reportedly accused her of infidelity. The accused has been arrested, and the couple's children provided harrowing accounts to investigators.

Who was Shivank Avasthi, Indian-origin student shot dead in Canada?
description: Tragedy struck near the University of Toronto Scarborough campus as 20-year-old Indian-origin PhD student Shivank Avasthi was fatally shot on December 23, 2025. Toronto Police confirmed the incident as a homicide, with investigations ongoing and no motive yet established. The Indian Embassy expressed deep anguish, offering assistance to the bereaved family and highlighting concerns for international student safety.

description: Police are investigating the murder of a Union Bank assistant manager, Bhuvaneshwari, allegedly by her husband, Balamurugan. He claims a divorce notice enraged him, but police haven't found it. Balamurugan confessed to planning the murder for a year, procuring a pistol, and observing her routine before shooting her. Investigations into the weapon's origin and deleted phone data are ongoing.

The State Human Rights Commission has registered a case, and a parallel probe is underway. Three police personnel have been suspended, and an ACP removed for negligence.

title: How to link your PAN with Aadhaar before Dec 31, 2025; step-by-step guide
description: PAN-Aadhaar linking deadline nears: Link your PAN with Aadhaar by December 31, 2025, or face consequences. Unlinked PANs become inoperative from January 1, 2026, impacting tax refunds and leading to higher TDS.
